name: OwnCourses server
description: API (and admin) server for OwnCourses platform

APP_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of data.

JWT_PASSPHRASE.description: Pasphrase used for signing JWT tokens.

JWT_SECRET_KEY.description: Raw secret key, required for creating tokens.

JWT_PUBLIC_KEY.description: Raw public key, required for verifying tokens.

SECURITY_SECRET.description: A secret key used for signing request coming from 3d party apps.

AWS_S3_KEY.description: AWS S3 key used for assets storage.

AWS_S3_SECRET.description: AWS S3 secret used for assets storage.

AWS_S3_BUCKET.description: AWS S3 bucket name used for assets storage.

AWS_S3_REGION.description: AWS S3 region code used for assets storage.
